articles.title: 'Total panic': Clashes break out after gunman kills three in Paris - Euronews
articles.description: The police said a person had been arrested and asked the citizens to avoid the area in the French capital's 10th district near Montmartre. #EuropeNews
articles.content:
Clashes between protestors and police broke out in Paris on Friday following a shooting that left three people dead and three others wounded.
A gunman opened fire in the 10th arrondissement, at Kurd… [+3088 chars]
